products.title: Splash Tiffany Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: A family favourite, their splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds. Splash tiffany blue is a chic light blue vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this blue vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Roma, Aqua Haze - Vertical Blind
products.description: There are few hues more uplifting than a gentle, pretty aqua, and that's what roma in aqua haze brings to a room. Light, supple, and tightly woven fabric provides the base for this blind, and hangs beautifully in straight louvres to be opened or closed at your leisure. Awaken to a calm, ocean feel by hanging the aqua haze in your master bedroom, where you can surround it with whites and turquoises; or use in the most contemporary of living or dining rooms, complementing with light woods and soft off-whites.
